value:
$WmMPID_イングリット,ch17_19_Ingrid_F_Normal,Face|I am Ingrid Brandl Galatea. Pleasure
to make your acquaintance.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_01,0|$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Hmph! I have you now. Ahh...and you
must be the summoner. All right. You
will be coming with me.$k$p$EFace_Smile|It will be best for you to do as I say.
If you do not, your punishment will
be severe, so for your own sake...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|No—$Nu?!$k$pPrincess Nótt, wait! What are your
plans for $Nu?!$k$p

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Wait—$Nu!$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Where has my damned sister gone
now?! Buzzed off, I guess! Get back
here, you...YOU—$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Princess Dagr! Princess Nótt is gone!
She took $Nu!$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Huh?! What is she up to? And why
take $Nu?!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Let's all calm down! I'm worried
about the summoner too, but...is
Gramr here?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I searched the vault, but I wasn't
able to find anything... Princess Nótt
must have taken it with her.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain2|Princess Dagr, do you have any idea
where she might have gone?$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Hmm... She does love hanging around
her stronghold, the Night Temple...$k$pBut would she really go to the first
place we'd think of? I'm not sure...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|We've no choice. Let's head that
way as soon as we can!$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Oh, actually... Hey, Alfster! ...Hey!
Are you ignoring me? Just running
off, are you? What's the RUSH?!$k$p$EFace|Ooh! Are Alfster and the summoner...
Are they, y'know...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Huh? ...Oh! No, nothing like that. But
$Nu is, well...$k$pI guess you could say they share
a special bond.$k$p$EFace_Cool|And the summoner is special to me
too, of course!$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain2|Please stay safe, whatever happens,
$Nu!$k$p$Sbs150|
